In Tic Tac Toe, the first move is often strategic. The center position (MIDDLE_CENTER) is generally considered a strong opening move because it gives access to 4 possible winning lines (two diagonals, one horizontal, and one vertical). The corner positions (TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_RIGHT) are also good opening moves as they each give access to 3 possible winning lines.
